content: **christmas mini tree crochet stocking** this cute christmas mini tree crochet stocking is a quick gift or ornament to whip up perfect as a gift to give or hang up on a tree **difficulty level | skills required** easy basic stitches simple shaping and finishing **yarns ** scheepjes cotton 8 4 ply 4 colors - green 2 variants cream and gold beige small amounts approx 20 50 yards for the stars i used - vinnis colours - nikkim 100% cotton yarn - ruby grapefruit **hooks & notions ** hook 3 2 5mm yarn needle **notes ** due to the nature of this pattern the yarn and hook used is only a suggestion and any substitute may be used size of finished product will vary depending on yarn and also size of hook used **size ** approx 4 inches in length 10 cm **abbreviations us terminology** **pattern support** full pattern support is available from the joanita theron designs facebook group or/and joanita theron designs ravelry group please post a question in the group and remember to tag me i will assist as soon as possible or one of my members will gladly jump in to help for questions relating to permission or usage email joanita@creativecrochetworkshop com
